Plot: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.
Language: German, English, French, Turkish, Hebrew, Spanish, Japanese
Title: Wings of Desire
Writer: Wim Wenders, Peter Handke (screenplay), Richard Reitinger (screenplay)
Actors: Bruno Ganz, Solveig Dommartin, Otto Sander, Curt Bois
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 18 wins & 10 nominations.
